plot: Inspired by Charlotte Perkins Gilman's The "Yellow Wallpaper", Furry Things is the story on one woman's inner unraveling and how she must cope with her traumatic past to demystify her uncertain present and solidify a future.
title: Furry Things
plot_es: Inspired by Charlotte Perkins Gilman's The "Yellow Wallpaper", Furry Things is the story on one woman's inner unraveling and how she must cope with her traumatic past to demystify her uncertain present and solidify a future.
plot_en: Inspired by Charlotte Perkins Gilman's The "Yellow Wallpaper", Furry Things is the story on one woman's inner unraveling and how she must cope with her traumatic past to demystify her uncertain present and solidify a future.
